definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bear a heavy load (NH id.; Ar. [[סְבַל]] sbal id.; cf. also sub [[זבל]] p. 259 b supr.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[סְבָלָם]] Is 53:4; 1 pl. [[סָבָָלְנוּ]] La 5:7; —Impf. 3 ms. [[יִסְבּׂל]] Is 53:11; 1 S. [[אֶסְבּׂל]] Is 46:4; 3 mpl. sf. [[יִסְבְּלֻהוּ]] Is 46:7; Inf. cstr. [[לִסְבּׂל]] Ge 49:15; —bear a load, [[וַיֵּט שִׁכְמוֹ לִסְבּׂל]] Ge 49:15 (poem in J; of Issachar under fig. of ass); of carrying an idol Is 46:7; of ´[[י]] carrying Isr. v:Is 46:4, v:Is 46:4; servant of ´[[י]] carrying load of pain Is 53:4 and guilt v:Is 53:11; Isr. bearing iniquities of fathers La 5:7.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[מְסֻבָּלִים]] laden, Ps 144:14 (i.e. pregnant Ges Hi Ew Hup-Now Che al.; perh. better, token of abundant harvest, so many, v. esp. Bae).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וְיִסְתַּכֵּל הֶחָגׇב]] Ec 12:5 drag oneself along, as a burden (v. [[חָגׇב]]).
